parameters.length_hrs: Length of the movie: hours portion.
parameters.opening_weekend_us: Box office totals for opening weekend in the US.
parameters.gross_world: All box office totals world wide.
parameters.gross_us: All box office totals in US.
parameters.length_min: Length of the movie: minutes portion.
parameters.release_date: Date the movie was released in the US.

title: Marvel Cinematic Universe films
description:
Description
A list of Marvel Cinematic Universe films through the Infinity saga.
The Infinity saga is a 23 movie storyline spanning from Ironman
in 2008 to Endgame in 2019.
reference:
Box office figures are not adjusted to a specific year.
They are from the year the film was released.
format: A data frame with 23 rows and 7 variables.
